attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In today's budget the talk is of helping 'families'.  What of those of us who don't have families, spouses or partners, not always out of choice?  Does the Prime Minister or the Chancellor have any idea how difficult it is to pay a mortgage, all household bills, council tax, road taxes etc., etc., on a salary of £20,000?  If we want a holiday we have to pay a single supplement.  So let's have more help for those of us who've worked since leaving college 26 years ago, have never had time off and have always paid our taxes etc.  Could we please have our taxes lowered to thank us for paying our way?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
